author: Al Jazeera
title: Street fighting erupts in battle for Ukraine’s capital Kyiv
description: Clashes follow strikes on bridges, schools and apartment buildings, as Russian forces mount an assault on Kyiv.
content:
Street fighting has broken out in Ukraines capital, Kyiv, as Russian forces advanced on the city and Ukrainian officials urged residents to take shelter.
